attributes.action: Ensure that helicopter flights from Battersea are vital & not corporate, leisure or public transport.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I live in W10 & find the choppers whizzing overhead to be extremely loud, unpleasent & disruptive to my pursuits. I listen to rock music whilst outside with in-ear phones & even this gets drowned out!! This noise impacts on everyone under the flightpath. So, we have 1 to 5 people per flight inconveniencing thousands for their own selfish ends. I wonder what the ecological impact is, regardless of noise pollution?
Who is so self important that their necessity to get from A - B as the multi kilo decibel crow flies, outweighs Londoner's rights to not be subjected to unecessary noise - especially when all other aspects of commercial/private noise pollution are zealously policed by Environmental Noise Officers.
